translations: v.与（某人）的妻子通奸，给（某人）的丈夫戴绿帽

sentences.sentence: Grace Mugabe - who is 41 years younger than her 86-year-old husband - has spent the past 5 years cuckolding him with Gideon Gono, head of the country's central bank.
sentences.translation: 格雷斯·穆加贝与86岁的总统老公年龄相差41岁，在过去5年间，她一直与津巴布韦央行行长吉迪恩·戈诺给丈夫绿帽戴。
